title: World Ender

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Give people false messages while waiting for your time to end the world.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Choose someone at night to receive a notification. This can be any notification besides a death notification.
- You can make the flavor text for the notification or you can make the host make the flavor text for you.
- On Day 5, you end the world, automatically winning.
- On Day 4, people will be told "The **World Ender** is about to end the world!"
- The game cannot end if you are alive.
- The world will not end if you are dead.

desc:
Post 591
*"All things must come to an end."*
